org.apache.flink.yarn

类 AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.client.deployment.ClusterDescriptor<YarnClusterClient>
    直接已知子类:
    YarnClusterDescriptor

    public abstract class AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor
extends Object
implements org.apache.flink.client.deployment.ClusterDescriptor<YarnClusterClient>
    The descriptor with deployment information for spwaning or resuming a YarnClusterClient.
